name: Stuck in Orbit (ductoman16)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 47: Theme "Stuck in a Loop"

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/stuck-in-orbit-3

You are a rogue planet, drifting through space, looking for a new solar system to call home. On the way, you'll need to collect resources from moons you pass by in order to stay alive.


Gameplay:

  • Pilot the planet using [UP]/[DOWN] or [W]/[S] keys.
  • Collect resource moons into your orbit by passing close, but not hitting them.
  • Collect 3 of the same moon to collect its resource.
  • Don't get stuck with a full orbit! Unload unwanted moons into nearby black holes.
  • Don't run out of any resources!
  • Try to get a high score!

Tools Used:

  • Godot 3.2.3
  • VSCode
  • Gimp
  • Audacity
  • abundant-music.com
  • Fonts
    • https://www.dafont.com/fipps.font
    • https://www.dafont.com/rainyhearts.font

Source:

https://gitlab.com/ductoman16/ld47-stuck-in-a-loop
